mapper.select:
select s.id as order_id, (select d.NAME from scs_domain_value d where s.NOTE_TYPE=d.VALUE and d.TYPE=25) as note_type, (select d.NAME from scs_domain_value d where s.PAY_TYPE=d.VALUE and d.TYPE=26) as pay_type, s.CREATE_TIME,s.END_TIME,s.CODE,s.NAME, (select p.NAME from scs_person_base p where p.ID=s.OWNER_CONN_POST) as OWNER_CONN, (select p.NAME from scs_person_base p where p.ID=s.CONSIGNEE_CONN_POST) as CONSIGNEE_CONN, (select p.NAME from scs_person_base p where p.ID=s.PAYER) as PAYER, s.TOTAL,s.CREDIT_LEFT, (select p.NAME from scs_person_base p where p.ID=s.CREATOR) as CREATOR,
c.id as consignee_id, (select p.NAME from scs_person_base p where p.ID=c.CONSIGNEE_POST) as consignee_name, (select p.NAME from scs_person_base p where p.ID=c.DRIVER_POST) as driver, (select d.`NAME` from scs_address a,scs_domain_value d where d.TYPE=11 and d.VALUE=a.PROVINCE and a.ID=c.ADDRESS) as province, (select d.`NAME` from scs_address a,scs_domain_value d where d.TYPE=11 and d.VALUE=a.CITY and a.ID=c.ADDRESS) as city, (select d.`NAME` from scs_address a,scs_domain_value d where d.TYPE=11 and d.VALUE=a.COUNTY and a.ID=c.ADDRESS) as county, (select a.DETAIL from scs_address a where a.ID=c.ADDRESS) as detail,
p.id as product_id, (select d.NAME from scs_domain_value d where s.NOTE_TYPE=d.VALUE and d.TYPE=20) as product_name, p.QUANTITY,p.BATCH,p.MFD,p.EXP,p.NO_TAX_PRICE,p.TAX_PRICE,p.TAX,p.TOTAL
from scs_order_sale s, scs_order_sale_consignee c,scs_order_sale_product p where s.ID= c.ORDER_SALE and c.ID = p.ORDER_SALE_CONSIGNEE and s.ID=#{id}
